high_descs: Turn around and walk to the left side of the desk on the right.
Pick up the alarm clock from the desk which is to the left of the laptop.
Walk to the right side of the desk and stand in front of the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and cross the room, then turn right and walk to the desk
Pick up the clock that is sitting on the desk to the left of the laptop
Take a step backward then a step to the left, continue to face the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a close by the light of a lamp

high_descs: Move across the room to the desk with the red chair
Pick up the red and yellow item on top of the desk left of the laptop
Carry the red and yellow item over to the night stand at the foot of the bed
Turn on the lamp on top of the night stand
anns.task_desc: Carry a red and yellow item (clock?) to the lamp, turn on the lamp
